through <S%G1722><s%> the hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> of men who speak lies, <S%G5573><s%> branded <S%G2743><s%> in their <S%G2398><s%> own conscience <S%G4893><s%> as with a hot iron; <S%G2743><s%>

forbidding <S%G2967><s%> marriage <S%G1060><s%> and commanding to abstain from <S%G567><s%> foods <S%G1033><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be received <S%G3336><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> by those who believe <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1921><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2938><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is good, <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> is to be rejected, <S%G579><s%> if it is received <S%G2983><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving. <S%G2169><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> it is sanctified <S%G37><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayer. <S%G1783><s%>

If you instruct <S%G5294><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> of <S%G5294><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> you will be <S%G2071><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> servant <S%G1249><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> nourished in <S%G1789><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the faith, <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the good <S%G2570><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> which you have <S%G3739><s%> followed. <S%G3877><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> refuse <S%G3868><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> old wives <S%G1126><s%>' fables. <S%G3454><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Exercise <S%G1128><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> godliness. <S%G2150><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> bodily <S%G4984><s%> exercise <S%G1129><s%> has <S%G2076><s%> some <S%G3641><s%> value, <S%G5624><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> has value <S%G5624><s%> in all things, <S%G3956><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the life <S%G2222><s%> which is <S%G3568><s%> now, <S%G2532><s%> and of that which is <S%G3568><s%> to come. <S%G3195><s%>
This <S%G3588><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> is faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> acceptance. <S%G594><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> to this end <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2872><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> suffer reproach, <S%G3679><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2872><s%> have set our trust <S%G1679><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Savior <S%G4990><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> especially of those who believe. <S%G4103><s%>

Until <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> pay attention <S%G4337><s%> to reading, <S%G320><s%> to exhortation, <S%G3874><s%> and to teaching. <S%G1319><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> neglect <S%G272><s%> the gift <S%G5486><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the laying on <S%G1936><s%> of the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the elders. <S%G4244><s%>
